PERRY LITTO, AND WERE ADVISED TO DEPART THEYARD, CROSSING ONTO MAIN 2. THIS REQUIRED THE CREW TO RUN AGAINST THE CURRENT OF TRAFFIC. WHILE TRAVELING UPGRADE AT APPROXIMATELY 10 MPH, THE CREW OBSERVED A LIGHT CONRAIL LOCOMOTIVE APPROACHING WESTBOUND ON MAIN 2. UPON REALIZING THAT AN IMPACT WAS IMMINENT, ENGINEER DUDZIK PLACED THE TRAIN IN EMERGENCY. THE CREW OF CR LOCOMOTIVE REMAINED IN THE CAB OF THE LOCOMOTIVE AT THE TIME OF IMPACT AND SUFFERED INJURY AS A RESULT. IMPACT OCCURRED 27 CAR LENGHTS EAST OF CONRAILS 12-E SIGNAL.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

293-d-09-29-93-AWW.Narrative: ON 09/29/1993, AT 2:15PM, AN INDIANA SOUTHERN RAILROAD TRAIN CREW WAS GIVEN VERBAL PERMISSION TO PLACE 84 LOADS OF COAL IN AWW NO. 3 & 4 YARD TRACKS FOR INTERCHANGE TO NORFOLK SOUTHERN., AFTER FILLINGNO. 3 TRACK, ISRR CREW BEGAN SHOVING THE REMAINING 38 LOADS INTO NO. 4 TRACK ATAPPROXIMATELY 2:30PTHE FIRST THREE LOADS OF THIS SHOVING MOVE MADE ITTHOUGH THE SWITCH, BUT THE FOURTH LOAD DERAILED ATSWITCH FOLLOWED BYTHE FIFTH THROUGH SEVENTH CARS BEFORE THE MOVEMENT COULD BE STOPPED. ATOTAL OF FOUR CARS DERAILED. IT WAS CONCLUDED THAT THIS DERAILMENT WASCAUSED BY A "PREVIOUSLY RUN-THROUGH SWITCH". THE POINT HAD TO BE GAPPED WHEN THE FLANGE ON THE FIRST CAR TO DERAIL RAN UP ON TOP OF THE POINTCAUSING THE BROKEN PIECE TO FALL BETWEEN THE POINT & THE STOCK RAIL.ALSO, IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THIS PARTICLULAR SET OF WHEELS RAN UP ON THE PINT BECAUSE THEY WERE ALMOST NEW WHEELS AND IT IS FARTHER BETWEENFLANGES OF WORN WHEELS THAN IT IS BETWEEN NEW WHEELS.NoneNoneNoneNoneNone

30908MWDAA-d-09-08-93-ATK.Narrative: TRAIN 19 TRAVELING SOUTH, AROUND THE SOUTH LEG OF THE NOUPT WYE TRACK WITH 2 LOCOMOTIVES AND SIX CARS DERAILED. THE REAR TRUCK OF LOCOMOTIVE802 HAD LONGITUDINAL SHOCK ABSORBERS ON BOTH THE ENGINEER'SAND FIREMAN'S SIDES INSTALLED INCORRECTLY. THIS REDUCED THE STROKE OF THE YAW DAMPER 2 1/2 INCHES WHICH CAUSED THE TRUCK TO LOCK UP, PREVENTING IT FROM ROTATING. THIS WAS EVIDENT BY THE LACK OF CONTACT ON THE ROTATION STOPS. THIS CAUSED THE LOW RAIL TO BOW. LOCOMOTIVE 802 HAD THE L-1, 1-3 AND R-1 WHEELS DERAIL AND BAGGAGE CAR 1129 HAD THE L-1 WHEEL DERAIL.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
